amendment.description: Amendment requires the CIA to submit to Congress a report that updates, and revises as necessary, the report prepared by the Director pursuant to law relating to a description of the effects of espionage against the United States, conducted by or on behalf of other nations, on United States trade secrets, patents, and technology development.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to require the CIA to report to Congress on the effect of foreign espionage, including industrial spying, on the trade balance of the U.S.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 407 - 1 (Roll no. 215).
